titles.title: A bill for the relief of Alice M. Rector.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/17/1988--Introduced. Treats a named decedent as having elected to participate in the Survivor Benefit Plan of the armed forces and a named individual as having qualified as an eligible beneficiary entitled to a survivor annuity.
